price: “Kandi nta bubasha twari tubafiteho; ahubwo mwari abantu barengera (imbibi za Allah).”
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lanā ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin bal kuntum qawman ṭāghīna
